sqlMap.select: SELECT T.tag_id, TAS.tag_name, count(TAS.tag_name) as tag_ctr FROM tags T, tas TAS WHERE T.tag_name=TAS.tag_name AND (TAS.user_name=#requestedUserName# OR TAS.group=0) AND T.tag_id = #id# GROUP BY TAS.tag_name
SELECT t1.tag_name, count(t1.tag_name) as tag_ctr FROM WHERE AND (t1.user_name=#requestedUserName# OR t1.group=0) GROUP BY t1.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT DISTINCT T.tag_name, T.tag_ctr FROM tags T, tas TAS WHERE T.tag_name=TAS.tag_name AND T.tag_ctr=#count# AND (TAS.group=0 OR TAS.user_name=#requestedUserName#) LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT tag_lower AS tag_name, tag_ctr FROM popular_tags WHERE content_type=#contentType# AND tag_lower != 'imported' LIMIT #limit#

SELECT t.tag_name, count(t.tag_name) as tag_ctr FROM tas t WHERE t.user_name=#requestedUserName# AND t.tag_name REGEXP #regex#
GROUP BY t.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t WHERE t.group = #groupId#
GROUP BY t.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t WHERE t.group = #groupId# AND t.user_name = #requestedUserName#
GROUP BY t.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT t1.tag_name, count(t1.tag_name) AS tag_ctr_user, t.tag_ctr_public AS tag_ctr_global FROM tas t1, tags t WHERE t1.user_name = #requestedUserName#
AND t1.tag_name = t.tag_name GROUP BY t1.tag_name
ORDER BY tag_ctr_user DESC
LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM ((SELECT tag_name FROM tas t1, groups g WHERE g.group = #groupId# AND g.user_name=t1.user_name
) UNION ALL (SELECT tag_name FROM tas t1, groups g, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = f.user_name AND t1.user_name = f.user_name AND g.group = #groupId# AND t1.group = #groupTypeFriends# ) UNION ALL (SELECT tag_name FROM tas t1, groups g WHERE t1.user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = t1.user_name AND g.group = #groupId# )) AS tagsalias GROUP BY tag_name
ORDER BY tag_ctr DESC
LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT t1.tag_name, count(distinct(t1.tas_id)) as tag_ctr FROM tas t1, tagtagrelations TTR WHERE TTR.upper = #tagIndex[].tagName# AND TTR.lower = t1.tag_name AND (t1.group=0 OR t1.user_name = #requestedUserName#) GROUP BY t1.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT t1.tag_name, count(distinct(t1.tas_id)) as tag_ctr FROM tas t1, tagtagrelations TTR WHERE TTR.lower = #tagIndex[].tagName# AND TTR.upper = t1.tag_name AND (t1.group=0 OR t1.user_name = #requestedUserName#) GROUP BY t1.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tags (tag_name, tag_ctr) VALUES (#name#, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tag_ctr = tag_ctr + 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tags SET tag_ctr = tag_ctr - 1 WHERE tag_name = #tagName#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t1, search_bibtex s WHERE MATCH(s.author) AGAINST (#search# IN BOOLEAN MODE)
AND t1.content_id = s.content_id
GROUP BY t1.tag_name ORDER BY tag_name COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT t1.tag_name, COUNT(t1.tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t, tas t1, groups g, groupids i WHERE t1.content_id = t.content_id AND i.group_name = #requestedGroupName# AND i.group = g.group AND g.user_name = t.user_name
AND (t.tag_name = #tagIndex[].tagName#) AND (t1.tag_name != #tagIndex[].tagName#) GROUP BY t1.tag_name ORDER BY tag_ctr DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT tt.tag_name, COUNT(tt.tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t, tas tt WHERE tt.content_id = t.content_id AND t.group = #groupId#
AND t.user_name = #requestedUserName#
AND (t.tag_name = #tagIndex[].tagName#) AND (tt.tag_name != #tagIndex[].tagName#) GROUP BY tt.tag_name ORDER BY tag_ctr DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT t.tag_name AS tag_name, count(t.tag_name) as tag_ctr FROM tas t,
, groups g, groupids i
WHERE t.content_id=t1.content_id AND
t.tag_name != #tagIndex[].tagName#
AND t.user_name = #requestedUserName#
AND t.group = #groupId#
AND i.group_name = #requestedGroupName# AND i.group = g.group AND g.user_name = t.user_name
GROUP BY t.tag_name ORDER BY tag_ctr DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

select.isEqual: SELECT TT.t2 AS tag_name, TT.ctr_public AS tag_ctr FROM tagtag TT WHERE TT.t1 = #tagIndex[0].tagName# AND TT.ctr_public > 0 AND TT.t2 != #tagIndex[0].tagName# ORDER BY TT.ctr_public DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
select.isGreaterThan:
SELECT t.tag_name AS tag_name, count(t.tag_name) as tag_ctr FROM tas t, WHERE t.content_id=t1.content_id AND
t.tag_name != #tagIndex[].tagName#
AND t.group IN ($groups[]$) GROUP BY t.tag_name ORDER BY tag_ctr DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

sqlMap.select: SELECT t.tag_name, t.content_id, tt.group, t.content_type, t.user_name, t.date, t.change_date, NULL as description, NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM tas t JOIN ( SELECT t1.content_id, t1.group FROM WHERE AND t1.user_name = #userName# AND t1.group < 2 UNION SELECT t1.content_id, t1.group FROM WHERE AND t1.user_name = #userName# ) AS tt USING (content_id)

SELECT w.item AS tag_name , ROUND(SUM(weight),5) * 10000 AS tag_ctr FROM rankings r JOIN weights w USING (id) WHERE (r.item = #tagIndex[].tagName#) AND r.dim = 0 AND w.dim = 0 AND w.itemtype = 0 AND w.item != #tagIndex[].tagName# GROUP BY w.item ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT #limit#

SELECT t.tag_name, count(t.tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM ( SELECT t1.tag_name FROM tas t1, bookmark b WHERE t1.content_id = b.content_id
t1.user_name=#requestedUserName#
AND b.book_url_hash = #hash#
) AS t GROUP BY t.tag_name ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT t.tag_name, count(t.tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM ( SELECT t1.tag_name FROM tas t1, bibtex b WHERE t1.content_id=b.content_id
t1.user_name=#requestedUserName#
AND b.simhash#simHash# = #hash#
) AS t GROUP BY t.tag_name ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT t2 AS tag_name, ROUND(sim * 100) AS tag_ctr FROM tagtag_similarity TTS WHERE TTS.t1=#tagName# ORDER BY sim DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT tag_lower AS tag_name, tag_ctr FROM popular_tags WHERE content_type=#contentType# LIMIT #limit#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tag_name, tag_ctr_public AS tag_ctr FROM tags WHERE tag_name NOT IN ('dblp', 'imported', 'system:imported', 'public','nn') AND show_tag = TRUE ORDER BY tag_ctr_public DESC LIMIT #limit# ) AS a ORDER BY LOWER(tag_name)

SELECT tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t1, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND t1.user_name = #requestedUserName# AND t1.user_name = f.user_name AND t1.group = 2
GROUP BY t1.tag_name ORDER BY tag_ctr DESC, t1.tag_name COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT t1.tag_name, count(tag_name) AS tag_ctr FROM tas t1, (SELECT * FROM bibtex WHERE bibtexKey = #bibtexKey# user_name = #requestedUserName# ) b WHERE b.content_id = t1.content_id
GROUP BY t1.tag_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT tt.tag_name FROM (SELECT t1.content_id FROM tas t1, search_bibtex s WHERE MATCH(s.author) AGAINST (#search# IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND t1.content_type = #contentType# AND t1.content_id = s.content_id AND (t1.tag_name = #tagIndex[].tagName#)
GROUP BY t1.tag_name ORDER BY tag_name COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci ) AS t LEFT JOIN tas tt ON (t.content_id = tt.content_id) LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
